cards.name: Father's Day Frank
cards.subtitle: The Tie Collector
cards.flavorText: Another tie? Seriously? I have 47 of them. But you're my kid, so I'll wear it. At least it's not another '#1 Dad' mug. Those things don't even keep coffee hot.

abilities.name: Tie Display
abilities.description: Proudly displays the latest hideous tie from the kids. +20 Dad Joke, -10 Fashion Sense (not that I had any to begin with).

cards.name: Breakfast in Bed Dad
cards.subtitle: Burnt Toast & Cold Coffee Champion
cards.flavorText: The kids tried! That's what matters. The toast is charcoal, the eggs are runny, and the coffee's been sitting for an hour. But they made it with love. I'll eat every bite and say it's delicious.

abilities.name: Proud Parent
abilities.description: Forces Dad to eat burnt toast with a smile. +30 Nap Power (food coma), +15 Dad Joke (material for later).

cards.name: World's #1 Dad
cards.subtitle: Has 47 Identical Mugs
cards.flavorText: Every Father's Day, another mug. I have enough mugs to start a mug shop. But I cherish every single one. Even the one from 1998 that says 'You're the Man'.

abilities.name: Mug Collection
abilities.description: Displays the ever-growing collection of #1 Dad mugs. +10 Thermostat (hot coffee), +5 Dad Joke (I make the same joke every year).

cards.name: Grill Gift Guru
cards.subtitle: Received Yet Another Meat Thermometer
cards.flavorText: This is the seventh meat thermometer I've gotten. I appreciate the thought, really. But I already have six. They're all in the drawer. One of them even talks.

abilities.name: Thermal Overload
abilities.description: Breaks out ALL the meat thermometers to prove a point. +25 Grill Skill, +15 Beer Snob (need a drink after explaining this).

cards.name: Pool Party Pete
cards.subtitle: Canonical Water Gun Dad
cards.flavorText: RULE #1: No running around the pool! RULE #2: I don't care how old you are, I WILL splash you. RULE #3: Yes, I have the biggest water gun. No, you can't use it.

abilities.name: Hydro Assault
abilities.description: Unleashes the Super Soaker 9000 on unsuspecting family members. +35 Cool Dad, -15 Fix It (electronics got wet).

cards.name: Lawn Sprinkler Larry
cards.subtitle: Running Through It At His Age
cards.flavorText: It's 92 degrees out. The sprinkler's on. The kids are running through it. I'm gonna run through it too. I don't care what the neighbors think. THIS IS SUMMER!

abilities.name: Cool Refreshment
abilities.description: Runs through the sprinkler in full dad attire. +20 Nap Power (tired now), +15 Sock & Sandal (they're wet anyway).

cards.name: Bonfire Bob
cards.subtitle: The Fire Is Too Damn Big
cards.flavorText: We needed a small fire for s'mores. We now have a blaze visible from three counties. The fire department is on speed dial. But LOOK AT IT BURN!

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Creates an inferno that could be seen from space. +40 Grill Skill, +15 Thermostat (it's VERY warm).

cards.name: Vacation Video Victor
cards.subtitle: 2 Hours of Footage No One Will Watch
cards.flavorText: Got some great shots of the highway. And a rest stop. And 45 minutes of a cloud that looked kinda like a dog. The family's already seen it 12 times. We're watching it again!

abilities.name: Premiere Screening
abilities.description: Forces the family to watch vacation footage for the third time today. +25 Remote Control, -20 Nap Power (everyone's asleep except him).

cards.name: Christmas Light Larry
cards.subtitle: Can See His House From Space
cards.flavorText: The neighbors complained about last year's display. So this year I doubled it. 47,000 lights. They synced to Trans-Siberian Orchestra. The electric company called to thank me.

abilities.name: Blitzkrieg of Blinks
abilities.description: Activates the full Christmas light display, causing temporary blindness. +50 Fix It (bulbs always need replacing), +25 Thermostat (the heat radiates).

cards.name: Ugly Sweater Steve
cards.subtitle: Festive Fashion Disaster
cards.flavorText: This sweater has actual working Christmas lights. Battery pack not included. Yes, I'm wearing it to work. No, I don't care what HR says. It's HOLIDAY SPIRIT!

abilities.name: Fashion Emergency
abilities.description: Debuts the newest ugliest sweater. The visual damage is permanent. +40 Sock & Sandal (fashion coordination), +30 Dad Joke (everyone's laughing).

cards.name: Cookie Crumbler
cards.subtitle: Left Them Out For Santa Again
cards.flavorText: Sure, I ate the cookies the kids left for Santa. I was doing Santa a favor. That guy's got a weight problem. I'm looking out for his health.

abilities.name: Midnight Snack
abilities.description: Consumes Santa's cookies and leaves a 'thank you' note with suspicious handwriting. +30 Nap Power, +20 Dad Joke (blames it on the dog).

cards.name: New Year's Resolution Randy
cards.subtitle: This Year I'll Actually Use The Gym Membership
cards.flavorText: This is the year. I can feel it. I'm going to get in shape. Just like last year. And the year before. But THIS year is different. Probably. Maybe. Okay, who wants pizza?

abilities.name: Annual Optimism
abilities.description: Believes this year will be different. Spoilers: it won't. +15 Nap Power, +10 Dad Joke (at least I can laugh about it).
